citations.narrative:
Four litters of recently whelped puppies are not being identified or recorded on records of animals on hand or “cage cards”
on the whelping box. The puppies were all born within the past two weeks. Having an accurate number and id of puppies
in the whelping boxes with their dam is important to ensure all puppies are accounted when checked. In one box with a
litter of 7 puppies, it was not readily observed that the dam had taken two puppies to the outside portion of her enclosure,
which were later discovered on the walk around and put back in the box. Offspring born must be identified in a timely
manner to be able to track puppy movements with the dam and then when separated at the whelp stage. This needs to be
addressed for record keeping purposes.
Correct by: Sept 9, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors 
Four litters of recently whelped puppies are not being identified or recorded on records of animals on hand or “cage cards” 
on the whelping box. The puppies were all born within the past two weeks. Having an accurate number and id of puppies 
in the whelping boxes with their dam is important to ensure all puppies are accounted when checked. In one box with a 
litter of 7 puppies, it was not readily observed that the dam had taken two puppies to the outside portion of her enclosure, 
which were later discovered on the walk around and put back in the box. Offspring born must be identified in a timely 
manner to be able to track puppy movements with the dam and then when separated at the whelp stage. This needs to be 
addressed for record keeping purposes.  
Correct by: Sept 9, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
